activities:
Yahoo! Inc.’s activities, as a data processor, relate to personal information received from the Yahoo! EMEA Sites including applications downloaded to mobile, tablet and other connected devices, varying according to the products or services requested by the user. As a data processor, Yahoo! Inc. stores and processes personal information from applications downloaded to mobile, tablet and other connected devices, and from the following web sites in the EU: Yahoo! Deutschland (de.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Osterreich (at.mail.yahoo.com); Yahoo! España (es.yahoo.com); Yahoo! Italia (it.yahoo.com); Yahoo! France (fr.yahoo.com); Yahoo! United Kingdom (uk.yahoo.com); Yahoo! Belgie (be.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Belgique (fr-be.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Bulgaria (bg.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Ceská republika (cz.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Danmark (dk.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Eesti (ee.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Greece (gr.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Ireland (ie.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Latvija (lv.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Lietuva (lt.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Magyarország (hu.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Nederland (nl.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Norge (no.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Polska (pl.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Portugal (xp.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Romania (ro.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Slovenská (sk.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Slovenija (si.mail.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Sverige (se.yahoo.com), Yahoo! Suomi (fi.yahoo.com) and other websites directed outside the EU (collectively, the “Yahoo! EMEA  Sites”), in each case provided by Yahoo! EMEA Limited (“Yahoo! EMEA”), incorporated and established in Ireland, as a data controller.
 
Yahoo! Inc. receives, stores and processes the above personal information as a data processor for Yahoo! EMEA to enable Yahoo EMEA to operate the Yahoo EMEA Sites including to enable registration on, and support of, the Yahoo! EMEA Sites, to provide Internet related products and services to users, to personalize those products and services, to engage in commercial transactions with users, to direct market to users, to analyze data, to improve products and services, to detect and prevent fraud.
 
Users described under the preceding paragraphs of this Safe Harbor certification are natural persons that use the Yahoo! EMEA Sites in their personal capacity outside their trade, business or profession. In order to view the HR Privacy Policy click on "Privacy Policy" hyperlink below or visit https://info.yahoo.com/privacy/us/yahoo/safeharbor/safeharbor_hr/. In order to view the Customer Data Privacy Policy click on the https://info.yahoo.com/privacy/us/yahoo/ link below.
 
Yahoo! Inc. also stores and processes personal data from its EU based companies, as data processor, in order to enable its EU and Swiss based companies to carry out their obligations under employment and benefit laws, to administer employee participation in the Yahoo! benefit, compensation and human resources plans and programs, for performance management and for compliance and discipline reporting and investigation.
contactoff1: Customer Care - Privacy Issues; Human Resources
eucountries: France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Norway, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The DMA Safe Harbor Program; except for HR Data, for which the dispute resolution is the EU data protection authorities (DPAs).
